justification: B is conservative and needs immediate floor at RB; trading away their only Tier 1 RB (Alex Thompson) for an injured WR (Derek Harris) and a TE is misaligned. B already has a Tier 1 TE (Alex Thomas), so ‘TE upgrade’ is incorrect. The offer leaves B’s RB room thin (only Ben King healthy), hurting short-term wins. Rationale is brief and factually off, and the acceptance probability is overly optimistic.
